I've been playing for soo long and saving any skins I receive from the game.
At some point I exchanged 10 items for 1 new skin , I got the new skin my 10 other skins also disappeared, but a few days later I noticed the new skin is GONE as well as my other 10 skins.
I contacted support, they said " we dont care" basically.

I am not recommending this game to anyone. You will not prosper
